summary: Adds the Venator Daemonous, a lore friendly faction to the game
descriptionHtml:
[center]



[b]
=======
Added a new quest

Added a new dungeon

Added a new companion

Cleaned some things up

Added a new banner

Added New Shields


=======


i had to start from scratch, monster wars was not playing ball, so i will be doing things my own way:)

This is just the first installment with most, if not all the elements required for me to patch and add content.

Big thanks to Karios for writing the history of the Venator Daemonous, which can found found at one of the merchants in game.


[b]Requires[/b]

Sky Momod v12 

Skse

To install, just place all the files in your data directory.


[b]Description:[/b]


This mod originally came about after the request of a couple of members to be an alternative or seperate addition to the original monster wars mod to replace the blue stripes for those 
who didn\\\'t quite like the feel or nature of the blue stripes.

-in this edition there are 350+ soldiers added.

- 6 of those are companions (they are spread over Skyrim, so get searching!)


[b]A brief overview of the Militia[/b]


The idea behind this elite mercenary band of warriors was to ensure the peoples of Skyrim and her subsidiaries would be secure if any demons or monsters were to mass invade the plains of Skyrim.

General Tullius personally gave his seal of approval to this entourage of mercenaries, warriors and knights as he knew that the imperial forces alone would struggle against any mass intrusion of monsters, the undead or the powerful.

Whilst creating this band, the General had to make alterations to the \"Martial Law\" law set by kings gone by, to which he had to seek approval from the King of Skyrim himself. Fortunately the King had enough clarity and foresight to see this was perhaps the best strategy incase of any invasion.

The alterations to the already standing law are as follows;

Whilst any militia may be formed in the defence of Skyrim and the towns within, no militia captain can override the rule of the local Jarl or try to usurp him or her.

The Venator Daemonous Militia may take up residence in any town, city or camp site as an added bulk to the already residing armed forces but cannot take control of the local armed forces unless given permission from the residing Jarl, or in his or her\\\'s absence. The Thane of the local town or City.

[b]Credits[/b]

The creator of the Lore Friendly Armour Pack â€“ he let his mod become public modable as he no longer supports that mod and has let anyone use it for their own.

Hothtrooper44 for his awesome armours

[b]Permissions[/b]

If you wish to alter, improve, integrate into another mod or anything that may need permission, you will need to ask for my approval and ask hothtrooper44 if you can further use his mods too.

DO NOT UPLOAD THIS MOD TO ANY OTHER SITE!!

[b]Install[/b]

MAKE SURE YOU HAVE SKYRIM MONSTER MOD v12

Download with NMM, it will do the hard work for you.

or if you have issues with NMM due to the file size...

Download manually, extract files to your Skyrim/Data directory

[b]Uninstall[/b]

use NMM or that does work just delete the files install in the Data directory.



Dhegonus[/center]
author: Dhegonus
